msbt.message: Thanks for coming over the other day! You can come over any old time! 'Specially if you bring snacks. Or a fish to look at! Anyway, here's that gift I couldn't give ya!

Thanks for coming to visit the other day! It was real nice to eat snacks, chill out, and goof off a bunch! Also, it's nice to have someone else leave crumbs behind. Here's that gift I couldn't give ya!
Thanks for hanging out the other day! Did ya have fun? I had tons of fun! You have the best confused looks! Come over and get confused again sometime. I hope you like this gift!
Y'know how I was like, "I'll send it to you!" when you were over? Well, I remembered! Remembering things feels funny. "Oh yeah" feels like a pillow, but "I forgot" feels like a stale chip.
